txt.en: 'Hullo! Would you like to be an \qAcquaintance\q of the Defenders of Minas Tirith? Well look no further! Completion of this quest should do that just for you.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon the Defenders of Minas Tirith will consider you an Acquaintance. Ready?'
Old An√≥rien - Defenders of Minas Tirith I
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Acquaintance of the Defenders of Minas Tirith.
